Recipe.title: Robert Redford Dessert
Recipe.Source: From the kitchen of Bobbi Beagley
Recipe.Description: Originally, this was called "Next Best Thing To Robert Redford". However, that is a mouthful, so everybody just started calling it "Robert Redford", which is just as well because our kids have no idea who Robert Redford is.

section.title: Crust
section.instruction: Mix Flour, Butter and Pecans until crumbly.
Press into 9&inch; &by; 13&inch; inch pan and bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

section.title: Bottom Layer
section.instruction: Beat Cream Cheese and Powdered Sugar on high with a mixer until smooth.
Fold in half of the Whipped Topping.

section.title: Top Layer
section.instruction: Mix the Puddings with the Milk, beat slowly with mixer until smooth (about 2 minutes).
Spread on top of Bottom Layer.
Let stand a few minutes, then spoon remaining Whipped Topping over top and spread carefully.

section.title: Finishing Touch
section.instruction: Sprinkle with grated milk chocolate bar.
Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
